Tracked Buffs

You can click to select multiple buffs at once. You can Drag & Drop buffs around to sort them or move them to the Untracked Buffs area.

  • Overload
  • Elder Overload
  • Weapon Poison
  • Darkness
  • Animate Dead
  • Perfect Equilibrium (BOLG Stacks)
  • Time Rift (Jas Book Proc)
  • Instability (FSOA Weapon Special)
  • Gladiator's Rage (Ful Book Proc)
  • Ancient Elven Ritual Shard
  • Adrenaline Potion Cooldown
  • Necrosis
  • Limitless
  • Balance by Force (BOLG Weapon Special)
  • Death Grasp (Death Guard Weapon Special)
  • Death Essence (Omni Guard Weapon Special)
  • Crystal Rain (SGB Weapon Special)
  • Berserk
  • Death's Swiftness
  • Greater Death's Swiftness
  • Sunshine
  • Greater Sunshine
  • Living Death
  • Enhanced Excalibur
  • Demon Slayer Ability
  • Dragon Slayer Ability
  • Undead Slayer Ability
  • Ingenuity of the Humans
  • Overhead Prayers
  • DPS Prayers (T95/T99)
  • Aura
  • Bonfire HP Boost

Untracked Buffs

    For best performance set buffs that aren't actively being used to Untracked.

    Settings

    General

    Number of buffs per row
    Fade Inactive Buffs - If toggled off buffs will disappear instead of appearing grayed out.
    Big Head Mode - The first buff will be made four times as large and take up two rows of buffs
    Overload Reminder - Displays a mouse tooltip for 3 seconds after Overloads expire
    Blink "Expired" Buffs - A blinking effect around any inactive buffs that can have 100% uptime (eg. Overloads, Weapon Poison)
    Split BOLG tracking into two separate buffs. One for weapon special timer and one for stacks
    Show Names - Only use this if you don't recognize the icons

    Overlay

    Make sure the "Show overlay" permission has been enabled for this plugin. You can check by clicking the wrench icon in the top right.

    Enable Overlay - You must leave the plugin open - but you may minimize it using the _ icon in the top right and move it somewhere out of the way.

    UI Scale

    Adjusts the display size of the Overlay.

    %

    Interface Search Speed

    Lower value will detect changes faster but may cause hits to overall performance. Adjust at your own risk - the default value should generally be fine. You must reload the app for the new value to take effect.

    ms

    Hard Reset

    Bad configuration values can break the plugin. This attempts to reset your configuration and reload the plugin. When troubleshooting this should be the first thing you should try to resolve your problem.
